t: Amazon grocery stores coming to Sacramento area. How do the high-tech shops work?
s: February 23, 2022 - Amazon Fresh grocery stores are coming to the Sacramento area, with one planned for Roseville and another in Elk Grove. They will be the first shops in the metro and Northern California. The company already operates stores in Southern California and elsewhere in the U.S. How does this high-tech shop work? t: Amazon to shutter West Sacramento fulfillment center. Here’s what it means for workers
